body: Paulo Lopes, in his blog, comments [pt] on  the  consequences  that  Brazil  would  suffer if evangelicals dominate the  country, major concern of the minister Ricardo Godim, who adds that "Every theocracy  becomes totalitarian, any  attempt to homogenize the culture, obscurantist  and  every effort to sanitize the customs, moralist".
